channel.title: Comments on: Now that BF2042 is just around the corner, I will miss OP underground but I also have mixed feelings about it.
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: Prownilo
item.dc:creator: Prownilo
item.description: These types of maps are always insanely popular for people who want a meat grinder, i would be surprised if there wasn't another one of it's type
item.content:encoded: These types of maps are always insanely popular for people who want a meat grinder, i would be surprised if there wasn’t another one of it’s type

item.title: By: 80spopstardebbiegibs
item.dc:creator: 80spopstardebbiegibs
item.description: Never enjoyed that map at all, just frustrating gameplay, reminiscent of how nuketown/shipment got shoehorned into every subsequent cod
item.content:encoded: Never enjoyed that map at all, just frustrating gameplay, reminiscent of how nuketown/shipment got shoehorned into every subsequent cod

item.description: People who use Type 2A are shitters tho
item.content:encoded: People who use Type 2A are shitters tho

item.title: By: Xb-Dashie-dX
item.dc:creator: Xb-Dashie-dX
item.description: Lmao I will never not laugh at shotgun/CQB SMG salt because like Ravic said: ‚Äúwhere else are you going to use shotguns besides those CQC maps‚Äù
item.content:encoded: Lmao I will never not laugh at shotgun/CQB SMG salt because like Ravic said: ‚Äúwhere else are you going to use shotguns besides those CQC maps‚Äù

item.title: By: thorbenpouwels
item.dc:creator: thorbenpouwels
item.description: I really cant enjoy underground. I bought BF to be able to flank and sneak past enemy lines. Having the feeling that it's a big open map with countless ways to play. But this map is just a large CoD map.
item.content:encoded: I really cant enjoy underground. I bought BF to be able to flank and sneak past enemy lines. Having the feeling that it’s a big open map with countless ways to play. But this map is just a large CoD map.

item.title: By: ObjectiveCaterpillar
item.dc:creator: ObjectiveCaterpillar
item.description:
Tbh its sometimes to just take your mmgs with your buddies bu5 your balls to ground and laugh at 10 kill streaks with clueless opponents just running into our bullets.
Sucks though when we get hammered with nades but its in the game and then we just switch tactics. ;)
item.content:encoded:
Tbh its sometimes to just take your mmgs with your buddies bu5 your balls to ground and laugh at 10 kill streaks with clueless opponents just running into our bullets.

Sucks though when we get hammered with nades but its in the game and then we just switch tactics. üòâ

item.title: By: Yoko_Grim
item.dc:creator: Yoko_Grim
item.description:
Fuck Type 2A, but more importantly, fuck that map.
Whenever I play that map I just use the M1918 I think it‚Äôs called. Has like 150 rounds, and I just lay down, and start shredding and preventing spawn camp.
